cosmos.question: I am big and yellow and shine in the day! What am I?

hints.text: 😎 You shouldn't look directly at me.
🌅 I go away when it's night time.

cosmos.question: I am round and sometimes you see me at night. I change shapes! What am I?

hints.text: 🌚 Sometimes I'm a circle, sometimes I'm not.

cosmos.question: I twinkle at night. I am very far away! What am I?

hints.text: 🔭 You can see lots of me in the sky when it's dark.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball of rock and water where you live! What am I?
I am a place where all the stars and planets live. What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 Everything you know is inside me.

cosmos.question: I am red and rocky and another planet. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 People call me the Red Planet
🔭 I am the fourth planet from the Sun

cosmos.question: I am a big, giant planet, made mostly of gas! What am I?

hints.text: 🔴 I have a big red spot.
🪐 I am the biggest planet in our solar system.

cosmos.question: I have rings around me! What planet am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rocks.
🪐 I am the sixth planet from the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am very, very far away, at the edge of our solar system and very cold! What am I?

hints.text: 🪐 I am the eighth planet from the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am a giant group of stars, gas, and dust. Our sun lives in one. What am I?

hints.text: 🌌 Our galaxy is called the Milky Way.

plant.question: I am green and grow outside. Birds sit in me. What am I?
I am red and round, and you can eat me. What am I?
I am long and orange, and bunnies like to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🐰 Bunnies love to munch on me

plant.question: I have a bright yellow head and follow the sun all day. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I like to face the sun

plant.question: I am a big, green vegetable. I have lots of leaves and make a yummy salad. What am I?

hints.text: 🥬 Rabbits and turtles enjoy eating me

plant.question: I am tall and have a thick trunk. I give you shade on a sunny day. What am I?

hints.text: ☀️ I block the sun with my leaves.

plant.question: I am small and colorful, and bees love to visit me for my sweet nectar. What am I?

hints.text: 🌸 I am pretty and have petals

plant.question: I grow in bunches. Monkeys love to eat me. What am I?

hints.text: 🍌 I am yellow when I am ripe.
🌴 I grow on trees in warm places.

plant.question: I am small and green and grow on the ground. You can walk on me with your shoes. What am I?

hints.text: ⚽ You can play games on top of me.

plant.question: I am small, red, and have little black seeds on the outside. What am I?

hints.text: 🪴 I can be grown in a garden
🎂 People put me on top of cakes.
